abstract: The government showed the jury e-mails to suggest that Rajat Gupta, the former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, harbored affection for the hedge fund titan Raj Rajaratnam.
snippet: The government showed the jury e-mails to suggest that Rajat Gupta, the former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble, harbored affection for the hedge fund titan Raj Rajaratnam.

headline.main: Prosecutors Seek to Show Gupta and Rajaratnam Were Close Friends

byline.original: By William Alden and Peter Lattman
